column2: Educational Leadership, Policy and Instructional Technology

column19:
This Excel file lists Spring 2019 Student Credit Hours (SCH) and Full-Time Equivalent (FTE) enrollments for each academic department at CCSU, grouped by school. It shows undergraduate (UG) and graduate (GR) credit hours taught by full-time (FT) and part-time (PT) faculty, along with totals and their conversion into FTE counts.

Abbreviations:

SCH = Student Credit Hours

UG = Undergraduate

GR = Graduate

FT = Full-Time

PT = Part-Time

FTE = Full-Time Equivalent (UG SCH ÷ 15, GR SCH ÷ 12)
